name: The Highlands of Jurgald
description:
The story is about Jaques, who as a young child, watched as woman Vikings attacked and slaughtered his family.
Before the Vikings could kill him, he escaped only to be kidnapped by pirates and forced to work on their ship.

After 10 years at sea, the pirate ship was attacked by women Vikings who killed everyone but him.
Because of his Viking lineage, he was spared and returned to his ancestral home in the highlands.

Your goal is to fight through bandits, orcs, fighters, and Vikings to reach the Castle where you will win the princess's hand in marriage.
Each of the 5 villages you defeat brings on a female companion you can utilize to cook, dance, or have deep meaningful conversations with.



You start your journey, as a scranny and weak young man continually getting beaten hand-to-hand combat.
With each defeat, your experience and level will slowly grow. As your level increases, you get stronger and more appealing to the Viking women.

Over 50+ Different women to fight

- Fight and build relationships with women in the game!
- Animated romantic scenes!
- High-Quality Renders!
- World map and movement system.
- Level system
- Inventory
